about_the_game:
Paradise's Secrets is a horror game developed with Unreal Engine 5. With its impressive and gripping story, every moment will be full and scary. You will feel everything that happens in your bones as you learn the secret of Paradise company.

Contrary to popular belief, the Paradise company is not innocent, it is up to you to reveal the secret of the Paradise company, but it will not be easy because the traces of the past remain forever and these traces can affect you as much as they did when you learn the secrets. When you learn all the secrets, nothing may be as you think.

Welcome to Paradise Company; we are delighted to see you here. By working with Paradise, you can save people around the world. All you need to do is join our Frightened team, which helps us capture malevolent spirits and prevent them from harming people. Remember, Paradise is a global company that strives to make the world a better place :)

To find your way in the dark, you need to use the flash of the camera where your memories are buried to illuminate your path and continue. However, you must use the flash at the right moments because it has a limited duration, and if you can't manage the timing, bad things can happen.

You will be present in multiple locations to learn about the purpose and secrets of the Paradise Company. All these locations are independent, carefully chosen places for you to uncover the company's secrets. While uncovering these secrets, you must also experience all the pain and fear that has occurred there, but in the end, you will confront the absolute truth. Remember, you must always bear the pain of the damaged lives left unfinished.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contains elements that are not suitable for all ages. May contain content such as: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Adult Content
